name: Dave
message: Hi Eshan – I’m fortunate not to be behind a proxy but I’m not sure why this would cause you a problem. Are you absolutely sure that the API key is correct? As for the Factory Client error that may be a red herring – I see those in my logcat output too. Have you tried installing the application on a real device [I’ve another post here about that]? This will tell you if it’s the firewall/proxy causing your problems.
